headline: Lackawanna County to receive money from opioid lawsuit settlement
author: Cody Butler
sentences: “We’re excited to get those dollars into the harm reduction programs that we have already implemented and have been ongoing for several years,” stated Frank Ruggiero, Lackawanna County Solicitor.
The Lackawanna County District Attorney’s Office, the county office of Drug and Alcohol Programs and the Lackawanna County Recovery Coalition are working to combat the epidemic.
